verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] considering an Army veteran who is a Republican member of Congress for the position of Veterans Affairs secretary .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: considering] [ARG1: an Army veteran who is a Republican member of Congress for the position of Veterans Affairs secretary] .
President Donald Trump is considering [ARG1: an Army veteran] [R-ARG1: who] [V: is] [ARG2: a Republican member of Congress] for the position of Veterans Affairs secretary .
